Text: been waiting for this. many thanks.
is this the half russain half english vid?
@sdklfjasd, as Killawife said, this is just the original score, i.e. the music used in the film. I will upload a proper DVDRip as soon as it is availible.
I think it would be smart if you'd change ''Original score'' to ''OST'', that attracts more people!

Hey guys, there's two Scott Pilgrim vs. the World soundtracks: the OST, which contains the songs in the movie by Sex Bob-Omb as well as other artists, and the Original Score, which has all of the original music composed for the film.
